issues.description: Epic to track all work related to payments, subscriptions, and Stripe integration.
As a user, I want to log in with my email and password to access my saved projects.
As a user, I want to sign up or log in using my Google account for faster access.
As a user, I want to be able to upgrade to a 'Pro' plan to get higher conversion limits and save more projects.

issues.summary: TASK: Integrate Stripe Checkout for 'Pro' plan
issues.description: Set up backend and frontend components for Stripe Checkout. Create webhook for successful payment.
As a user, I want a 'delete' button on my project card in the dashboard so I can remove old sketches.

issues.summary: BUG: Code preview renders incorrectly on Firefox
issues.description: The generated HTML/CSS in the preview iframe looks broken on Firefox (works on Chrome). Seems to be a flexbox or grid CSS issue.

issues.summary: PERF: Pre-process and compress images before AI conversion
issues.description: Large images are slow and expensive to send to the AI. We should resize and compress all images (e.g., to max 1024x1024) on the backend before processing.

issues.summary: OPS: Set up production logging and monitoring
issues.description: Configure production environment (e.g., AWS) to send logs to Datadog/Sentry. Set up basic alerts for 500 errors and high latency.
As a user, I want to be able to click on the title of my project in the dashboard and rename it.
